reviewText:
It took 5 minutes to 100% this game and I would upvote if it wasnt so broken.

First of all, it popped up on the wrong monitor and because it uses unity I couldnt change it.

Another thing is how bugged out the controls are, with the camera constantly changing it causes the the controls to suddenly switch while youre in the middle of moving.

My point is, unless you are hunting for easy perfect games, DO NOT BUY THIS

reviewText:
Pros:
Price is cheap

Cons:
Easy levels
Easy to 100% game
There's no challenge
Looping soundtrack
Options menu lacks controls section, fullscreen

*PRO TIP*
(You can get all achievements in a single level in under 2 minutes)
1. Click Load Maps

2. Choose Blocky Hell

3. Move forward and stop beside the white rotating block (1st death)
Achievement Unlocked:Blocky Death
You died in the blockiest way possible

*Same level restarts when you die*

4. Keep moving right to the green block
Achievement Unlocked:Space Time Teleport
You traveled through a space time warp allowing instant travel to another location

5. Stay still after teleportation and get hit by a grey block that shoots bullets (2nd death)
Achievement Unlocked:Turret Encounter
You have seen turret fire!

Got Shot
You got shot.

6. Move right in the red line and stay still. Repeat 4 times. (6 deaths total)
Achievement Unlocked:Suicidal Block
You have died more then 5 times, Wow

You like good and challening puzzle games? Nah sorry this one's not. Don't buy, just ESCAPE THIS"!

3/10"

reviewText:
Product received for free

I got this game for free

Honestly this game is very rough and was confusing for the first 5 minutes I played it. The concept of it is cool, a little cube goes around and tries to escape different maps. There are many obstacles along the way, turrets, spinning obstacles and parts of the floor that if you step on you get injured. One of my biggest problems with it was that I was unsure when I died because it had no  GAME OVER  or  You're Dead screens, it just went to the loading screen. Obviously the graphics may not be the best, but it was made in Unity so I'm gonna give it some slack. The biggest plus for me was the achievements, I got all 5 in  2 minutes  of playing!

Pros  Cheap
Easy To Play
Can Get All Achievements In 2 Minutes
Cons  Very Rough
Confusing Enemies
Little Instructions
Unity Game

Overall I would not say I regretted this game because I am an achievement hunter and I did end up 100% it. Will I ever come back to this game? Honestly probably not unless the creator added more achievements. If the game was polished a bit more it would be a fun little game to play. In it's current state I would not recommend it.

2/10

reviewText:
Product received for free

Well... Atleast I got an easy 100% game done...Right!?Ok so yeah, I got this game for free from a giveaway so I'll treat it as such. +1 point
Straight off the bat I notice this is a Programmer game and by that I mean simple illuminated cubes with different colors to tell you what is what or atleast I thought it was.
There’s perhaps 10-15 levels I don't really know and I realized after a few levels when it changed to a level I had already done before that the levels are randomly selected on completion.

Within the first 6 minutes I had all the achievements unlocks, which I'm not complaining about so +1 there.

There’s no instructions so you just have to figure it out which is fine in the beginning when you (the blue cube) have to dodge the red things and get to the green thing.... but sometimes red blocks don't even do anything, they just push you around and there’s some kind of health system on some levels but not all where you can hit red things for a little bit before doing. Then there are purple teleporters and light blue switches but the issue is when you go from a simple level at the start then it randomly picks a level with like 15 different colored blocks and you're like ok what does this do, oh I shouldn't have stood on that red colored ground.... oh wait I'm not dying... oh but that other red thing kills me... ok

3/10 Giving this game a positive review because it was free, I got 100% achievements out of it and I like colorful cubes
